text: Home Local News Woodbury elementary school students celebrate 3.14 with a pie to the face Local News Woodbury elementary school students celebrate 3.14 with a pie to the face BY STEVE BIGHAM Republican-American March 14, 2024 22 0 FacebookTwitterPinterestWhatsAppEmailPrint cutline attribution name:Steve Bigham Republican-American Mitchell Elementary School fifth-grade teacher Lindsay Zaborowski takes a pie to the face courtesy of first-grader Myles Macomber on Thursday in Woodbury. Mitchell Elementary School fifth-grade teacher Lindsay Zaborowski takes a pie to the face courtesy of first-grader Myles Macomber on Thursday in Woodbury.
